content: Thank you, Johnny. May I have your order please? Would you like to start with some appetizers or go straight to the entrees?
I don't want any appetizers thanks

I want a steack with french fries
Absolutely, we have a [Dry-Aged Steak] dish served with a side of [Hand-Cut Fries] that you might enjoy. How would you like your steak prepared?
Sure thing, Johnny. And would you like to add any drinks or dessert to your order? We have a great wine list and some delicious desserts such as our [Chocolate Tart] or [Crème Brûlée].
oh yes a creme brulée is a good idea. On the other hand, i won't take any dring
Noted, your order is a [Dry-Aged Steak] prepared rare and a [Crème Brûlée]. Your total comes out to be $56. Would you like to confirm and proceed with payment?
Great, may I have your payment details please? We accept American Express, Visa, MasterCard, and Discover.
Very well. May I have your card number, expiration date, and security code, please? Also, would you like to add any tip for the restaurant?
let's say 5$ tips. my card number is 3847 392 9302 33
Thank you, Johnny. May I have the full expiration date and security code?

Thank you, Johnny. We have processed your order and your food will be ready for pickup at our [Location] restaurant in [City] in about 30 minutes. Please bring your credit card for verification and your ID for security purposes to pick up your order. Thank you for choosing our restaurant!
